name: Philosopher's Stone - A Puzzle
description:
Philosopher's Stone is a beautiful puzzle game with a simple goal - arrange the tiles on the Flower of Life board to match the target pattern. Just tap to rotate the tiles. Choose between clockwise and counter-clockwise rotation.

Create your own amazing puzzle designs by unlocking the puzzle editor! Then shuffle the board for 3 great challenge levels.

FEATURES
3 game modes:
- Normal
- Timed
- Level Create
Beautiful puzzle designs
Unique game mechanics
Interact with friends on Social Media
